alert.note: Alert for City of Franklin; Southampton (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 22 at 2:25PM EDT until June 22 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM EDT FOR SOUTHAMPTON COUNTY AND THE CITY OF FRANKLIN... At 224 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Whaleyville to near Boykins, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. These severe thunderstorms will remain over mainly rural areas of Southampton County and the City of Franklin, including the following locations... Vicksville, Handsom, Berlin, Manry, Worrell, Dory, Sunbeam, Riverdale, Sebrell and Branchville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
